Mandate: Serve underbanked households and micro-businesses with credit, savings, and financial literacy while monitoring fraud risks.
TopPriorities: Keep disbursements compliant with KYC requirements and share red flags.
Bridge the digital gap for rural SMEs for approved billing channels.
Monitor loan client cash flows for indicators of forced invoicing.
ActiveOperations: Field agents scanning receipts before disbursing micro-loans.
Financial literacy programs covering tax obligations.
Payment data matching against revenue collection cases to avoid VAT claim abuse.

Bridge the digital gap for rural SMEs for approved billing channels.
Monitor loan client cash flows for indicators of forced invoicing.
ActiveOperations: Field agents scanning receipts before disbursing micro-loans.
Financial literacy programs covering tax obligations.
Payment data matching against revenue collection cases to avoid VAT claim abuse.

RecentActions.Title: Flagged suspicious loan applications
RecentActions.Summary: Referred cases to Financial Intelligence Centre after detecting fund loops.

RecentActions.Title: Digital payment system integration
RecentActions.Summary: Onboarded cooperatives into digital ecosystem for tax compliance.
